entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
